header: Infrastructure, power generation and real estate projects
text: We support investors in defining the most convenient structure for the financing and investment of their projects, helping consortia that participate in bidding processes for airport concessions, highway systems, among others. Our team has extensive experience advising groups in the real estate, hotel, office, commercial and residential industries, which can be established through investment vehicles such as Infrastructure and Real Estate Trusts (FIBRAS), real estate trusts, among others.
